subject: Wrong address
description_text:
Hello, I made a mistake in my delivery address.


It is not 156 but 157 Chemin du Mas de la Bedosse.


Can you change it?


Thank you in advance.


Have a nice day.



[image0.png]

conversations.body_text: Hi Anthony Brante,  â€‹I have revised it to No. 157 for you. You can check it. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me.
